ComicInfo.Summary:
Breathing fresh air for the first time in decades, the souls once condemned to Toulon's Puppets have been freed to live in flesh and bloos bodies. But if they are out of the Puppets... who's in? "THE REBIRTH" continues, to explore the world and mythos created in the cult classic Puppet Master film series!
